name: XMLRuleProcessors
shortdesc: A collection of XML rule processors.

parameters.name: rulePaths
parameters.shortdesc: The XPath condition paths of the rules in the rule set.

parameters.name: prefixMappingTable
parameters.shortdesc: The namespace mapping table. Can accept: Array of Arrays of 2 Strings. (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLRuleProcessor (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the XMLRuleProcessor.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessors within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLRuleProcessor, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: XMLRuleProcessor, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLRuleProcessor, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: XMLRuleProcessor, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the XMLRuleProcessor that follows the desired XMLRuleProcessor.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the XMLRuleProcessor whose index follows the specified XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The XMLRuleProcessor whose index comes before the desired XMLRuleProcessor.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every XMLRuleProcessor in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLRuleProcessor.
Returns the XMLRuleProcessor with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
